messy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Sorry the place is so messy, I haven’t had time to clear up.
messy.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a messy situation is complicated and unpleasant to deal with
messy.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He’s just been through a particularly messy divorce.
